Class Product

java.lang.Object
cop4331.model.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductComponent
public class Product extends Object implements ProductComponent

Represents a product with attributes like name, type, description, prices and quantity.

Implements the ProductComponent interface.

Author:
Denry Ormejuste, Benjamin Carver

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product(String name, String type, String description, double salePrice, double invoicePrice, int stockQuantity)

      Constructs a Product object.

      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Product.
      type - The type/category the Product belongs in.
      description - A description of the Product.
      salePrice - How much the Product is being sold for.
      invoicePrice - How much the Product cost the seller.
      stockQuantity - How much Product is in Inventory.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If salePrice, invoicePrice, or stockQuantity is negative.

    • reduceStockQuantity

      public void reduceStockQuantity(int stockQuantity)

      Removes the specified amount from the product stock quantity.

      Specified by:
      reduceStockQuantity in interface ProductComponent
      Parameters:
      stockQuantity - The amount to remove from the stock quantity.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If quantity is invalid or greater than stock quantity.

    • isInStock

      public boolean isInStock()

      Checks if the product is in stock.

      Returns:
      true if one or more items are in stock, false otherwise.

    • addStockQuantity

      public void addStockQuantity(int quantity)

      Adds the specified quantity to the stockQuantity attribute of the Product.

      Parameters:
      quantity - The amount to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If quantity is negative or would cause an integer overflow.
